title: Visibility Attribute
description: For convenience, the visibility shortcode attribute is now set to false by default so private posts/pages won't appear in the sitemap list unless set to true.

title: New Default Settings
description: The post_type_label_font_size and sitemap_container_margin attributes in the sitemap blocks/shortcodes are now set to empty strings by default to blend in better with the current active WordPress theme.

title: New Sort Options
description: New sort options (Random Order, Menu Order, Comment Count) have been added to the Orderby attribute for the main sitemap block and shortcode.

title: New Shortcode Attribute
description: Added a new num_terms attribute to the [simple-sitemap-group] shortcode to limit the number of taxonomy terms displayed.

title: Preview Sitemap Blocks
description: Added support for block previews in the editor for sitemap and sitemap group blocks, when browsing blocks.
